headline: Ask HN: What hardware technology/startup are you excited about?
description:
While reading a 2020 Ask HN [1], I was amazed that some of the most interesting techs mentioned are hardware, making hardware is difficult and expensive, which also makes it precious and exciting, so what are your picks for exciting hardware(and HW related software) in 2022?

[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=23276456
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你对什么硬件技术/创业公司感到兴奋？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你對什麼硬件技術/創業公司感到興奮？
